Orim of the Shadow:
Sword of Binding! And the Soul-trap Crystal! You acquired the 2 holy objects! Now, if only we find out where Zeruel is...!
My searching spell wasn't exactly a success, so I couldn't find out Zeruel's location exactly, but I have a clue of where he might be. I think he is now in the northern part of Dion Castle Town, somewhere near the Floran Village. It is likely that he is dwelling inside a human body.
When Zeruel reveals himself, fight him and kill his body with all your might. But, remember. The last stroke must be done with Sword of Binding. Then you must seal his spirit with the Soul-trap Crystal. You can do it. Please hurry.
